name: ZOMBI ROCKSTAR
description: "ZOMBIE ROCKSTAR" is a platform hack and slash video game in which you will play a punk guitarist escaping from the zombie canival holocaust. The only weapon he has is his electric guitar, with which he will create infernal riffs that will accumulate energy and allow him to use special powers to defeat his enemies. Through a fast-paced and frantic story you will enjoy good rock at the hands of charismatic characters.
